summary: The diff implements a documented, frontend-only rollback-to-v35 workflow (docs + scripts), preserves Live publish guardrails via strict Version 29 enforcement while adding a separate rollback/testing path, and fixes the Draft v36 catalog regression by switching Catalog to use `useGetAllBooks()` plus explicit user-visible error rendering. A minimal manual regression checklist document is also added. However, the request mentions catalog/library UI; only the Catalog page change is evidenced in the diff. The diff also includes unrequested UI/footer marketing/support additions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the regression that prevents previously uploaded books from being visible in the catalog/library UI (not just catalog).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a fix on `frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx` (switch to `useGetAllBooks()` and add error UI), but provides no evidence of any corresponding fix in the Library/MyLibrary UI components/pages. Since the requirement explicitly calls out catalog/library UI, coverage for the library side is not evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer changes adding social/contact links, a customer service chat dialog entry point, and caffeine.ai attribution/UTM tracking (beyond a version indicator).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on rollback workflow, deployment guardrails, and fixing catalog/library visibility regression. These footer marketing/support/attribution elements are not requested.
